short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that records your history.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser Watchman is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help you effortlessly record and manage your browsing history. Whether you need to keep track of websites for work, research, or personal use, Browser Watchman ensures you never lose sight of your online activities.
